title: Castle Clinton National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Aerial view of Battery Park in lower Manhattan. Castle Clinton is the almost circular structure near the middle of the photo. NPS PHOTO  Think nothing new happens at an old fort? Think again!  This National Park Service site always has something going on. At the edge of the largest city in the nation, Castle Clinton includes public programs and activities. Check out our news releases to see what's going on today.
